question:
You have just read an article in a national newspaper which claims that town centers in your country all look very similar to each other.you don't fully agree with this opinion.

Write a letter to the editor of the newspaper in your letter
•say which points in the article you agree with
.explain ways in which your town center is different from most other centers
•offer to give a guided tour of your town to the writer or f the article
text: I am excited and took great pride to write this letter as I can see a few adorable things about my town's places. In addition, an article which you published on the community parks and kid's play schools is really awesome and I did not even think about it in my dream.

However, as you see from east to south, there are huge differences among those centres and towns too. Having said that, in the south end, we have luxury high-rise buildings and on the other hand, we have a very small and traditional house under one roof which is quite opposite. Therefore, I strongly believe that we have exclusive centres with different designs and mind-blowing theme parks throughout the town.

Last but not the least, I am more than happy to guide you and show you all these mesmerizing places. Hence, I would request you to please let me know your's availability for the same. I would really appreciate it if you could confirm your requirements in advance to execute the smooth tour without any further issues.
I look forward to hearing your response with dates and availability to see these spectacular places.
